column4: Is there a way to undelete something in ext2? The system hasnt been touched since...
Some links to get you started:    http://www.xs4all.nl/~carlo17/howto/undelete_ext3.html   http://glandium.org/blog/?p=184
- Odd-rationale - I just powered off the computer without unmounting the partition (its not root)... seems like most of it is still there
I never done the process myself. You're on your own. Good Luck!
